definition: to inspect metal for flaws (using X-ray or ultrasound etc)
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: Mr. Superintend, do you want to perform magnetic particle testing on tailshaft taper?
sentences.chinese: 機務總管先生，尾軸的梢頭需要磁粉探傷嗎？

sentences.english: Our company introduced two new flaw detectors.
sentences.chinese: 引進了兩臺新型的探傷儀。

sentences.english: Procedure for penetrant inspection shall consist of .
sentences.chinese: 液體滲透探傷步驟應包括。

sentences.english: Improve the testing equipment, magnetic detection machines and hardness.
sentences.chinese: 檢驗設備完善，有磁粉探傷機和硬度計。

sentences.english: In the testing of plate and forgings , transducer frequency shall usually be .
sentences.chinese: 鍛件和板材探傷用換能器頻率一般爲。

sentences.english: A new determinating method is presented of the equivalent size of defects for ultrasonic examination of forgings.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了鍛件超聲波探傷缺陷當量尺寸新的測定法。

sentences.english: In this paper, out-of-focus image restoration processing of the magnetic particle testing system is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論熒光磁粉探傷系統散焦圖像復原處理問題。

sentences.english: The used ultrasonic testing method is only limited to A-scope pulse-echo method.
sentences.chinese: 所用的超聲探傷方法僅限於八型顯示脈衝反射法。

sentences.english: This paper introduced a fluorescent magnetic particle Non-destructive testing system.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一套熒光磁粉無損探傷檢測系統。

sentences.english: After removing these attachments, the surface shall be ground flush and examined by magnetic particle method.
sentences.chinese: 在拆除這些附件後，對錶面進行打磨並進行磁粉探傷。

sentences.english: Supplies custom made automated non-destructive testing and measuring systems for industrial applications.
sentences.chinese: 提供自制的工業用途自動無損探傷和測量系統。

sentences.english: Defects were found in side of LC 9 forged ring after detection.
sentences.chinese: LC9鍛環經探傷檢驗內部存在缺陷。

sentences.english: The question if nondestructive flaw detectors are metrological instrument is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 從多個方面討論探傷機是否屬於計量器具。

sentences.english: NDT is the primary method to check the structures and weld joints.
sentences.chinese: 無損探傷是對結構和焊接接頭進行檢驗的主要手段。

sentences.english: To the signal from the detector, automatic separation of pneumatic components.
sentences.chinese: 由探傷儀給信號，氣動元件自動分離。

sentences.english: The analog signals of ultrasonic fault detector are digitalized successfully.
sentences.chinese: 成功地將超聲探傷儀輸出的模擬信號數字化。
